body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have Noble Hierarch card in play.
2. Observe that it is not considered as a mana source. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Cards in hand that could be played with the help of Noble Hierarch should be highlighted.
Such cards are not highlighted, and cannot be played. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.17 on WinXP SP3 Please provide any additional information below. See attached screenshot.
author: [itandet...@google.com](https://code.google.com/u/102749124872534336455/)
title: Noble Hierarch card isn't treated as a mana source

comments.body:
Thank you for the report.

This bug has been reported a few times, I guess Noble Hierarch must be a popular card :)
The bug fix for this will be in Magarena 1.18, that will hopefully be out around the end of this month.

**Status:** Duplicate
